<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>çº¯é™æ€æ‰‹å†™æ¿</title>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css">
  <style>
    * {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    }
    
    body {
      background-color: #f5f7fa;
      padding: 20px;
    }
    
    #notePad {
      max-width: 800px;
      margin: 0 auto;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      border-radius: 12px;
      box-shadow: 0 2px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
      overflow: hidden;
    }
    
    #debugInfo {
      padding: 8px 16px;
      background-color: #f7f8fa;
      color: #8a919f;
      font-size: 13px;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #f0f2f5;
    }
    
    button {
      padding: 8px 16px;
      border-radius: 6px;
      border: none;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-size: 14px;
      transition: all 0.2s ease;
      display: inline-flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 6px;
    }
    
    button:hover {
      opacity: 0.9;
      transform: translateY(-1px);
    }
    
    button:active {
      transform: translateY(0);
    }
    
    .top-controls {
      padding: 14px 16px;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #f0f2f5;
    }
    
    .main-btn {
      background-color: #36cbcb;
      color: white;
    }
    
    .main-btn:hover {
      background-color: #2dbaba;
    }
    
    #drawArea {
      display: none;
    }
    
    #canvas {
      width: 100%;
      height: 400px;
      background-color: #fbfbfb;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #f0f2f5;
      cursor: crosshair;
    }
    
    .draw-controls {
      padding: 12px 16px;
      background-color: #ffffff;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #f0f2f5;
      display: flex;
      gap: 10px;
    }
    
    .action-btn {
      background-color: #f5f7fa;
      color: #333;
    }
    
    .action-btn:hover {
      background-color: #eef0f3;
    }
    
    #result {
      min-height: 200px;
      padding: 20px;
      text-align: center;
      background-color: #ffffff;
    }
    
    #result p {
      color: #999;
      font-size: 15px;
      padding: 40px 0;
      line-height: 1.6;
    }
    
    #result img {
      max-width: 100%;
      border-radius: 8px;
      box-shadow: 0 1px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
      transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <div id="notePad">
    <div id="debugInfo">å·²åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼ˆç‹¬ç«‹é¡µé¢ï¼‰</div>
    <div class="top-controls">
      <button class="main-btn" onclick="openDrawArea()">
        <i class="fas fa-pen"></i> æ‰“å¼€æ‰‹å†™æ¿
      </button>
    </div>
    <div id="drawArea">
      <canvas id="canvas" width="800" height="400"></canvas>
      <div class="draw-controls">
        <button class="action-btn" onclick="clearCanvas()">
          <i class="fas fa-eraser"></i> æ¸…é™¤
        </button>
        <button class="action-btn" onclick="saveCanvas()">
          <i class="fas fa-save"></i> ä¿å­˜
        </button>
        <button class="action-btn" onclick="closeDrawArea()">
          <i class="fas fa-times"></i> å…³é—­
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div id="result">
      <p>æ‰‹å†™å†…å®¹å°†æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨è¿™é‡Œ</p>
    </div>
  </div>

  <script>
    var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
    var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    ctx.strokeStyle = '#000';
    ctx.lineWidth = 2;
    ctx.lineCap = 'round';

    let isDrawing = false;
    canvas.onmousedown = (e) => {
      isDrawing = true;
      let rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(e.clientX - rect.left, e.clientY - rect.top);
    };
    canvas.onmousemove = (e) => {
      if (isDrawing) {
        let rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
        ctx.lineTo(e.clientX - rect.left, e.clientY - rect.top);
        ctx.stroke();
      }
    };
    canvas.onmouseup = () => { isDrawing = false; };
    canvas.onmouseout = () => { isDrawing = false; };

    function openDrawArea() { document.getElementById('drawArea').style.display = 'block'; }
    function closeDrawArea() { document.getElementById('drawArea').style.display = 'none'; }
    function clearCanvas() { ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height); }
    function saveCanvas() { 
      let imgData = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
      document.getElementById('result').innerHTML = `<img src="${imgData}" style="max-width:100%;">`;
      closeDrawArea();
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>

  1. search.jsonæ–‡ä»¶

      {{- $pages := where .Site.RegularPages "Type" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections -}}
{{- $notHidden := where .Site.RegularPages "Params.hidden" "!=" true -}}
{{- $filtered := ($pages | intersect $notHidden) -}}

{{- $result := slice -}}

{{- range $filtered -}}
    {{- $data := dict "title" .Title "date" .Date "permalink" .Permalink "content" (.Plain) -}}

    {{- $image := partialCached "helper/image" (dict "Context" . "Type" "articleList") .RelPermalink "articleList" -}}
    {{- if $image.exists -}}
        {{- $imagePermalink := "" -}}
        {{- if and $image.resource (default true .Page.Site.Params.imageProcessing.cover.enabled) -}}
            {{- $thumbnail := $image.resource.Fill "120x120" -}}
            {{- $imagePermalink = (absURL $thumbnail.Permalink) -}}
        {{- else -}}
            {{- $imagePermalink = $image.permalink -}}
        {{- end -}}

        {{- $data = merge $data (dict "image" (absURL $imagePermalink)) -}}
    {{- end -}}

    {{- $result = $result | append $data -}}
{{- end -}}

{{ jsonify $result }}

      {{- $pages := where .Site.RegularPages "Type" "in" .Site.Params.mainSections -}}
{{- $notHidden := where .Site.RegularPages "Params.hidden" "!=" true -}}
{{- $filtered := ($pages | intersect $notHidden) -}}

{{- $result := slice -}}

{{- range $filtered -}}
    {{- $data := dict "title" .Title "date" .Date "permalink" .Permalink "content" (.Content) -}}

    {{- $image := partialCached "helper/image" (dict "Context" . "Type" "articleList") .RelPermalink "articleList" -}}
    {{- if $image.exists -}}
        {{- $imagePermalink := "" -}}
        {{- if and $image.resource (default true .Page.Site.Params.imageProcessing.cover.enabled) -}}
            {{- $thumbnail := $image.resource.Fill "120x120" -}}
            {{- $imagePermalink = (absURL $thumbnail.Permalink) -}}
        {{- else -}}
            {{- $imagePermalink = $image.permalink -}}
        {{- end -}}

        {{- $data = merge $data (dict "image" (absURL $imagePermalink)) -}}
    {{- end -}}

    {{- $result = $result | append $data -}}
{{- end -}}

{{ jsonify $result }}
